welcome_title: Welcome to the Visual Memory Test
welcome_p1: This test will assess your visual memory capacity - how many items you can remember after seeing them briefly.
welcome_p2: You will be shown a set of images for a short time. After they disappear, you will need to select which images you remember seeing.
welcome_p3: The test will start with a small number of images and gradually increase in difficulty. The test ends after three failed attempts at the same level.
select_remembered_images: Select all images you remember seeing
recall_instructions: Select all the images you remember seeing
fullscreen_notice: The test will automatically enter fullscreen mode for better concentration. Press Escape at any time to exit fullscreen.
